List of ref links

- [Look at this]

List of todo markers; should not be recognized as links
- [ ] This is not done
- [o] This is one item
- [-] Partially done

Scheme shortcut with @citekey notation short for zot:citekey. Multiple keys in
brackets [@c1; @c2]. Should not match in e.g. emails first.last@domain.com.
